logIn.bodyDescription: Log in, so you can manage the web
logIn.infoTermsPrivacyRecovery:
By logging in you accept our Terms and Privacy

Forgot your password?
logIn.checkPasswordChar:
Wrong password, accepted characters:

a-z A-Z 0-9 @ * # _-
logIn.checkPasswordUpperCase: Incorrect password, at least one capital letter
logIn.checkPasswordLowerCase: Incorrect password, at least one lowercase letter
logIn.checkPasswordNumber: Incorrect password, at least one number
logIn.checkPasswordSpecial:
Incorrect password, minimum one special character:

* # @ _-
logIn.checkPrivilege: Your account does not have privileges to connect in the panel
logIn.checkBanned: Your account is blocked for violating the: Terms and Privacy of this website, click here to appeal: Contact
logIn.checkActivateAccount: Your account is not active, click here: Activate
logIn.mailContent:
Hello %s, we must verify that you are.

Security code:

%s

Copy and paste code in form verification of the account.

Verification date: %s

If you did not create this account, ignore this message, your email will be removed from our website in the next 48 hours, a thousand apologies.
logIn.log: Verifying the account from the panel
logIn.logTokenTemp: tokenTemp deleted correctly from the panel
logIn.verify: You are logging in from another device, click here: Verify
